alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Lumpkin (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 29 at 11:26PM EST until December 30 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST FOR NORTHEASTERN PAULDING...CHEROKEE...FORSYTH...NORTHERN COBB... SOUTHWESTERN LUMPKIN...DAWSON AND NORTHEASTERN FULTON COUNTIES... At 1125 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Marblehill to Hollis Lathem Reservoir to Lathemtown to Hickory Flat to near Due West, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marietta, Canton, Cumming, Dawsonville, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Johns Creek, Alpharetta, Milton, Kennesaw, Woodstock, Acworth, Holly Springs, Ball Ground, Braswell, Free Home, Buffington, Dougherty, Hickory Flat and Kellogg Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EST for north central and northwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
